ResponseRule.name: Nullwave Path 01: Alex and January Argue
ResponseRule.description: As Morgan arrives Alex is waiting in the station Bridge. He's rigged a device to remote detonate the Nullwave Transmitter. January has the machine Jammed--if the player lets the conversation play out, January will zap Alex.

ResponseRule.name: Nullwave Path 02: January and Alex React to Morgan's Appearance
ResponseRule.description: This conversation plays if the player interrupts "January and Alex Argue" on the Bridge, if the Nullwave device has been planted, but before January can zap Alex. This argument also ends with january zapping Alex. Unless the player intervenes first.

ResponseRule.name: Nullwave Path 03: January Stunned Alex.
ResponseRule.description: This convo plays if the player waits to show up intil after Alex has been zapped by January. January stands ground, forbidding player to activate the Nullwave.

ResponseRule.name: Nullwave Path 03: January Stunned Alex Trigger.
ResponseRule.description: This convo plays if the player waits to show up intil after Alex has been zapped by January. January stands ground, forbidding player to activate the Nullwave.

ResponseRule.name: Nullwave Path 04: Alex Alive. January Dead.
ResponseRule.description: Alex is waiting in the station Bridge. He's rigged a device to remote detonate the Nullwave Transmitter. January is not present.

ResponseRule.name: Nullwave Path 05: Morgan Destroys January
ResponseRule.description: Nullwave is primed to go. Alex reacts to Mogran clubbing January. Then instructs player to activate the nullwave.

ResponseRule.name: Nullwave Path 05: Morgan Destroys January Trigger
ResponseRule.description: Nullwave is primed to go. Alex reacts to Mogran clubbing January. Then instructs player to activate the nullwave.

ResponseRule.name: Nullwave Path 00: January Alive. Player Kills/Stuns Alex.
ResponseRule.description: This convo plays if the player is on the Nullwave Path, and the player shows up on the Bridge and kills or stuns Alex before January does. January is there, preventing the player from triggering the end game.

ResponseRule.name: Nullwave Path 00: January Alive. Alex Already Dead.
ResponseRule.description: This convo plays if the player is on the Nullwave Path, but Alex is dead, and the player shows up on the Bridge. January is there, preventing the player from triggering the end game.

ResponseRule.name: Nullwave Path 00: January Stunned Alex. Loiter Lines
ResponseRule.description: This convo plays if the player waits to show up intil after Alex has been zapped by January. January stands ground, forbidding player to activate the Nullwave. Follow-Up Click Me Lines

ResponseRule.name: Destruct Path 06: January and Alex Argue
ResponseRule.description: Alex confronts January. Alex destroys January by the end of the convo, unless the player intervenes.

ResponseRule.name: Destruct Path 07: January and Alex React to Morgan's Appearance
ResponseRule.description: This conversation plays if the player interrupts "January and Alex Argue In Front of Escape Pod" before Alex can shoot January.

ResponseRule.name: Destruct Path 08: January and Alex React to Morgan's Appearance--Morgan Has Too Much Alien Juice
ResponseRule.description: This conversation plays if the player interrupts "January and Alex Argue In Front of Escape Pod" before Alex can shoot January. In this versoin, Alex provokes January to reveal that he/she will not let Morgan off the station, since Morgan has too many Alien modifications. January zaps Alex in this one.

ResponseRule.name: Destruct Path 09: Alex Killed January
ResponseRule.description: This convo plays if the player lets the first overheard play it to it's conclusion (january dead). Alex took his frustration out on January but won't harm his sibling or get in the way.

ResponseRule.name: Destruct Path 09: Alex Killed January - Player Present
ResponseRule.description: This convo plays if the player lets the first overheard play it to it's conclusion (january dead). Alex took his frustration out on January but won't harm his sibling or get in the way.

ResponseRule.name: Destruct Path 09: Alex Killed January Trigger.
ResponseRule.description: This convo plays if the player lets the first overheard play it to it's conclusion (january dead). Alex took his frustration out on January but won't harm his sibling or get in the way.

ResponseRule.name: Destruct Path 09: Alex Killed January Trigger - Player Present
ResponseRule.description: This convo plays if the player lets the first overheard play it to it's conclusion (january dead). Alex took his frustration out on January but won't harm his sibling or get in the way.

ResponseRule.name: Destruct Path 10: Alex Alive. January Dead
ResponseRule.description: Alex is waiting on the bridge. Station is primed to blow. Alex makes one last appeal. January not available because it was destroyed earlier.

ResponseRule.name: Destruct Path 10: Alex Alive. January Dead. Trigger.
ResponseRule.description: Alex is waiting on the bridge. Station is primed to blow. Alex makes one last appeal. January not available because it was destroyed earlier.

ResponseRule.name: Player is Male
Branch--Martyr
Branch--Escape Pod
Branch--Go With Your Friends
Destruct Path 11: Alex Reacts to Morgan Trigger Self Destruct
ResponseRule.description: Alex has a reaction to Morgan throwing the final switch. Alex goes and sits down to watch the big fireball.

ResponseRule.name: Destruct Path 12: Alex Last Words On the Bridge
ResponseRule.description: Alex is seated. It's too late to revese course.

ResponseRule.name: Destruct Path 00: After January Pulled Shuttle Trick
Destruct Path 00: Player Triggerd Destruct. January Alive. Alex Dead. Determine Escape
ResponseRule.description: Player Pulled the Trigger. Station is going to blow up. No Alex around. What follows next depends on the player's state, and shuttle availability.

ResponseRule.name: Destruct Path 00: January Alive. Alex Dead.
ResponseRule.description: Player shows up ready to blow up the station. January asks the player to blow up the station. No Alex around.

ResponseRule.name: Destruct Path 00: January Alive. Alex Dead. Trigger.
ResponseRule.description: Player shows up ready to blow up the station. January asks the player to blow up the station. No Alex around.

ResponseRule.name: Destruct Path 00: January Zapped Alex to Keep Him From Revealing Escape Pod
ResponseRule.description: January just zapped Alex after Alex outed January's plan to not let Morgan off the station (because he has too much alien juice in his head). Alex Jan didn't want Alex to reveal he had an escape pod.

ResponseRule.name: Destruct Path 00: Alex Loiter Lines While Waiting to See if Morgan Commits
ResponseRule.description: Everything has been said. Alex is waiting around to see if the player is actually going to push the button to blow it all up.

ResponseRule.name: Destruct Path 00: January Waiting to See if Morgan Commits Destruct. Loiter Lines.
ResponseRule.description: Player has the destruct ready to go. Not Null-Wave. January comments if the player clicks.

ResponseRule.name: Destruct Path 00: January Waiting for Morgan to Depart Station. Loiter Lines.
ResponseRule.description: Player has the destruct ready to go. January comments if the player clicks.

ResponseRule.name: Destruct Path 00: January Waiting for Morgan to Depart Station. Loiter Lines. ALien
ResponseRule.description: Player has the destruct ready to go. January comments if the player clicks.

ResponseRule.name: Branch--PlayerHasEscapeMeans
ResponseRule.description: Alex is staying to die.

ResponseRule.name: Branch--PlayerStuckHere
ResponseRule.description: Alex is staying to die.

ResponseRule.name: Player is Male.
Player is female
Branch - Player Male
Player Is Male
Player is Female
Player is Female
No Escape Path Available
Escape Path Available--January Tricks
Branch -- Player Does Not Have The Key
Nullwave/Destruct Path 13: January Alive. Alex Dead.
ResponseRule.description: Alex is dead and the player has activated BOTH the Null Wave and the Self Destruct. This convo plays if the player is on the Nullwave Path, but Alex is dead, and the player shows up on the Bridge. January is there, preventing the player from triggering the end game.

ResponseRule.name: Nullwave/Destruct Path 13: January Alive. Alex Dead. Trigger.
ResponseRule.description: Alex is dead and the player has activated BOTH the Null Wave and the Self Destruct. This convo plays if the player is on the Nullwave Path, but Alex is dead, and the player shows up on the Bridge. January is there, preventing the player from triggering the end game.

ResponseRule.name: Nullwave/Destruct Path 00: Alex Alive. January Dead.
ResponseRule.description: January is dead and that player has activated BOTH the Null Wave and the Self Destruct. Alex is waiting in the station Bridge. He's rigged a device to remote detonate the Nullwave Transmitter.

ResponseRule.name: Morgan did not interrupt
Branch -- Player Has The Key
Morgan interrupted
Branch - Player Female
Nullwave/Destruct Path 00: Alex Alive. January Dead. Trigger.
ResponseRule.description: January is dead and that player has activated BOTH the Null Wave and the Self Destruct. Alex is waiting in the station Bridge. He's rigged a device to remote detonate the Nullwave Transmitter.
